data.title: THE MIRROR HAS TWO FACES
data.meta_description: motion picture |   Feature film (over 60 minutes).   "In a sentimental mood" by Manny Kurtz, Irving Mills, Duke Ellington; "Satori" by and performed by Tony Scott; "Try a little tenderness" by Harry Woods, Jimmy Campbell, Reg Connelly, performed by David Sanborn. (Songs).   Inc: Gary Grant, Malcolm McNab, trumpet; Bruce Fowler, Alan Kaplan, Andy Malloy, trombone; Jim Thatcher, French horn; Tom Boyd, oboe solos; Dan Higgins, Gary Foster, woodwinds; George Doering, guitar; Tommy Morgan, harmonica. (Soundtrack Personnel).   Motion Picture (Form).
